Text:
Anyone have any input on a/v?

Looks like it's got a lot of support, but no one has said.

The scene4all release has a green skull in the comments saying it (the s4a release) was really jerky (though everyone else gave it high ratings)

Thx to MANTESH for the up!
Just finished the "sample.avi," looks genuine and decent quality.
Sincere thx, hawkesk57 - I appreciate it :)

This was a solid copy, for the record... Maybe a little dark, but complete and entirely watchable. I'd give it a 9/9 or 9/10. 

2 days ago, i was unable to find eng subs for this release. May well be some out there by now.

Thx to MANTESH and all seeders and leechers - Sincerely appreciated!
